/**
 * useVisualizationHelpers.js - Visualization Helper Functions Hook
 * 
 * This hook provides common visualization management functions:
 * - Manages chart expansion and collapse states
 * - Handles visualization rendering logic
 * - Provides shared functionality between dashboard types
 * - Manages expanded item state across components
 * - Offers consistent visualization handling patterns
 * 
 * Reduces code duplication between PatientDashboard and PhysicianDashboard components.
 */import React from'react';import Placeholder from'../components/ui/Placeholder';/**
 * Shared hook for common visualization helper functions
 * Extracts duplicate logic from PatientDashboard and PhysicianDashboard
 */import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const useVisualizationHelpers=(patientId,allVisualizations,selectedVisualizations)=>{const[expandedItem,setExpandedItem]=React.useState(null);const handleExpand=React.useCallback(itemId=>{setExpandedItem(prev=>prev===itemId?null:itemId);},[]);const renderVisualization=React.useCallback((visualizationType,itemId)=>{if(!patientId){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Placeholder,{message:"Please select a patient to view data.",type:"select-patient"});}const viz=allVisualizations[visualizationType];if(!viz)return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Placeholder,{message:"Invalid visualization",type:"error"});const Component=viz.component;const isExpanded=expandedItem===itemId;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Component,{patientId:patientId,isExpanded:isExpanded,onExpand:()=>handleExpand(itemId),viewMode:"patient"// This will be overridden by the calling component
});},[patientId,allVisualizations,expandedItem,handleExpand]);return{expandedItem,handleExpand,renderVisualization};};export default useVisualizationHelpers;
